{{ questionNumber }}. Angular Large Data

Consider the following scenario:

  • You have a database with a large (100k+) number of vehicles.
  • An API returns a JSON formatted list of all vehicles.
  • The information is not time-sensitive and does not get "stale".

Discuss how you would structure an app using Angular patterns to provide the following views:

Cars
Trucks
SUVs
Vehicles A-Z
Vehicles by $
  • The API should be called only once.
  • What things need to happen?
    • Request to API
    • Caching data
    • Sorting
    • Displaying in views
  • Where do these things happen?
    • Service or effect
    • ReplaySubject, Local storage, NgRx Store
    • Service, reducer, component
    • Component template
  • How many / what components are needed?
    • Component for each page
    • Component for each "bucket" or can 1 component do all of it?
  • What if the number of vehicles is an order of magnitude greater?
  • What if the information on each vehicle is very large? (e.g. 1MB)
  • What if the response is very slow? (e.g. 10 seconds)
  • What if the types of vehicles are dynamic?
  • What if the views required are dynamic?
